main event: A witness observed a small round white glowing object in Miami, Florida on 9 January 1956.
interesting points: The object was compared to the size of a dime at arm's length., The tail of the object was 5 to 6 times longer than the object itself., The observation lasted for 3 seconds., The object was reported to make no sound and was slower than a meteor., The object moved in a NE to SW direction at a constant speed.
